languages.text: И снова перед вами — пылающий мир. Он весь покрыт гейзерами, исторгающими из недр облака горючего газа. Все они питают один огромный пожар, охватывающий планету. Тысячи лет назад одна вспышка грозы или иная мелочь запустила цепную реакцию, превратившую мир в огненный ад.

traits.locale_text: И снова перед вами — пылающйи мир. Он весь покрыт гейзерами, исторгающими из недр облака горючего газа. Все они питают один огромный пожар, охватывающий планету. Тысячи лет назад одна вспышка грозы или иная мелочь запустила цепную реакцию, превратившую мир в огненный ад.

languages.text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.
languages.original_text: И снова перед вами — пылающий мир. Он весь покрыт гейзерами, исторгающими из недр облака горючего газа. Все они питают один огромный пожар, охватывающий планету. Тысячи лет назад одна вспышка грозы или иная мелочь запустила цепную реакцию, превратившую мир в огненный ад.

traits.locale_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousand years ago a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousand years ago a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

languages.text: 你又见到了一个燃烧世界。它被间歇泉覆盖，喷出炽热的蒸汽云，整颗行星笼罩在巨大的火球中。这种情况的起因能追溯到几千年前，一道闪电或是某些星星点点的火花，与蒸汽云形成了连锁反应，将整个世界变成了炙热的地狱。
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

traits.locale_text: 你又见到了一个燃烧世界。它被间歇泉覆盖，喷出炽热的蒸汽云，整颗行星笼罩在巨大的火球中。这种情况的起因能追溯到几千年前，一道闪电或是某些星星点点的火花，与蒸汽云形成了连锁反应，将整个世界变成了炙热的地狱。

languages.text: また別の惑星が目の前で焼けている。焼夷ガスが噴出する間欠泉に覆われ、惑星を包む大火災を引き起こしている。何千年も前、一筋の稲妻か何らかの火花が連鎖反応を引き起こし、世界は燃え盛る地獄と化した。
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

traits.locale_text: また別の惑星が目の前で焼けている。焼夷ガスが噴出する間欠泉に覆われ、惑星を包む大火災を引き起こしている。何千年も前、一筋の稲妻か何らかの火花が連鎖反応を引き起こし、世界は燃え盛る地獄と化した。

languages.text: Otro mundo arde ante tus ojos. Está cubierto de géiseres que expulsan nubes de gas incendiario, alimentando una enorme conflagración que envuelve el planeta. Hace miles de años, un relámpago u otra chispa desencadenó una reacción en cadena que transformó el mundo en un infierno abrasador.
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

traits.locale_text: Otro mundo {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}arde{/g} ante tus ojos. Está cubierto de géiseres que expulsan nubes de gas incendiario, alimentando una enorme conflagración que envuelve el planeta. Hace miles de años, un relámpago u otra chispa desencadenó una reacción en cadena que transformó el mundo en un infierno abrasador.

languages.text: Erneut brennt vor deinen Augen eine Welt. Sie ist mit Geysiren bedeckt, die Wolken aus entzündlichem Gas rülpsen und einen gewaltigen Brand nähren, der den gesamten Planeten umhüllt. Vor Tausenden von Jahren hat ein einziger Blitz oder ein anderer Funke eine Kettenreaktion ausgelöst, durch die diese Welt in ein flammendes Inferno verwandelt wurde.
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

traits.locale_text: Erneut brennt vor deinen Augen eine Welt. Sie ist mit Geysiren bedeckt, die Wolken aus entzündlichem Gas rülpsen und einen gewaltigen Brand nähren, der den gesamten Planeten umhüllt. Vor Tausenden von Jahren hat ein einziger Blitz oder ein anderer Funke eine Kettenreaktion ausgelöst, durch die diese Welt in ein flammendes Inferno verwandelt wurde.

languages.text: Un monde de plus parmi tant d'autres brûle sous vos yeux. Sa surface est constellée de geysers crachant des nuées de gaz incendiaires qui alimentent encore et toujours l'incendie permanent dans lequel il est enveloppé. Il a suffi d'un seul éclair ou d'une brève étincelle il y a des milliers d'années pour provoquer une réaction en chaîne qui a transformé la planète en brasier infernal.
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.

traits.locale_text: Un monde de plus parmi tant d'autres brûle sous vos yeux. Sa surface est constellée de geysers crachant des nuées de gaz incendiaires qui alimentent encore et toujours l'incendie permanent dans lequel il est enveloppé. Il a suffi d'un seul éclair ou d'une brève étincelle il y a des milliers d'années pour provoquer une réaction en chaîne qui a transformé la planète en brasier infernal.

languages.text: Yanan bir dünya daha karşında duruyor. Bu gezegen, bol bol yanıcı gaz çıkarıp gezegeni saran devasa bir yangını besleyen gayzerlerle kaplı. Binlerce yıl önce düşen tek bir yıldırım veya çakan bir başka kıvılcım, bu dünyayı cayır cayır yakan zincirleme reaksiyon başlatmış.
languages.original_text: Yet another world is burning before your eyes. It is covered in geysers belching forth clouds of incendiary gas, feeding a massive conflagration enveloping the planet. Thousands of years ago, a single flash of lightning or some other spark launched a chain reaction that transformed the world into a blistering inferno.
